pullRequest.title: DHFPROD-4375: Warning popout before automatic logout
pullRequest.bodyText:
Implementation requires all endpoints to call resetSessionTimer in finally block.
Popup Warning timer is configurable in application.config.js ( use 290 for testing )
Auto logout time can be changed for testing ( line 25 in modal-status.tsx ) set to 280
Created modal-status.tsx component that I will later extend to support 500 network request errors.

Checklist:
- Note: do not change the below


Owner:


 JIRA_ID included in all the commit messages


 PR title is in the format JIRA_ID:Title


 Rebase the branch with upstream


 Squashed all commits into a single commit


 Added Tests


Reviewer:


 Reviewed Tests

nodes.bodyText:
Is this the setting that determines the time of activity before the modal appears? Should that setting be stored with the SESSION_WARNING value so they are both in the same place and configurable?
Also, I tried changing this to 60 and it still took a looong time for the modal to appear, seemingly more than a minute. Not sure why.

Can you specify what measure this is? I'm assuming seconds.
Also, this seems to be the modal countdown value? In which case "Start of countdown value in Session Timeout modal" is probably a more accurate description? Inactivity time before session warning appears is maxSessionTime? The measure for that (seconds) should also be noted.
